titleStmt.title: A memorial of all the English monarchs being in number 151, from Brute to King Charles. In heroicall verse by Io. Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Beale, for Iames Bowler,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last two leaves are blank.
Running title reads: A memoriall of monarchs from Brute to King Charles.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
With added frontispiece portrait of King Charles. Some print faded and show-through; some pages creased, torn, and tightly bound.
